channel.title: World on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in World on NewsStreet

item.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar: American Journalist Detained for Wearing Pride T-Shirt
item.description: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar: American Journalist Detained for Wearing Pride T-Shirt Grant Wahl later said he was released and a security commandant approached him and apologised for the incident and allowed him into the stadium

item.title: Colorado Shooting: Report Says Rising Hatred Towards LGBTQIA+ Community in US May Have Played a Role
item.description: Colorado Shooting: Report Says Rising Hatred Towards LGBTQIA+ Community in US May Have Played a Role The US is currently seeing a rise in transphobia, homophobia and LGBTQIA+ sentiments and members see the Colorado shooting as a consequence of the rising hate

item.title: In Ukraine, there were interruptions in the work of the Internet against the backdrop of missile strikes
item.description: In Ukraine, there were interruptions in the work of the Internet against the backdrop of missile strikes In Ukraine, significant disruptions to the Internet connection are recorded due to missile attacks on the territory of the country.

item.title: ब्रिटेन के PM बनने के बाद पहली बार पीएम मोदी से मिले ऋषि सुनक, ऐसी रही बातचीत
item.description: ब्रिटेन के PM बनने के बाद पहली बार पीएम मोदी से मिले ऋषि सुनक, ऐसी रही बातचीत बाली में जी20 शिखर सम्मेलन के पहले दिन प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी और ऋषि सुनक ने चर्चा की.

item.title: Vice President Dhankhar meets Cambodian PM, discuss bilateral ties
item.description: Vice President Dhankhar meets Cambodian PM, discuss bilateral ties Both leaders also witnessed the exchange of four agreements in the areas of culture, wildlife and health.

item.title: North Korea Cannot Feed Its People, but Has Money for Weekly Missile Tests: How?
item.description: North Korea Cannot Feed Its People, but Has Money for Weekly Missile Tests: How?

item.title: The creator of “Tender May” Kuznetsov will be buried in Orenburg
item.description: The creator of “Tender May” Kuznetsov will be buried in Orenburg The composer and creator of the Laskovy May group, Sergei Kuznetsov, will be buried in Orenburg on November 13.

item.title: Gisela clarifies to Cappillo that she will not endure any more infidelities: “Lucecita is married, here it is respected”
item.description: Gisela clarifies to Cappillo that she will not endure any more infidelities: “Lucecita is married, here it is respected” It doesn’t support it.

item.title: Unilever’s Health Data Shows Junk-Food Metrics Are Up For Debate
item.description: Unilever’s Health Data Shows Junk-Food Metrics Are Up For Debate Unilever said Friday it’s now aiming for 85% of its servings to meet its own science-based nutrition criteria by 2028.

item.title: Musk’s Twitter Roils With Hate Speech As Trolls Test New Limits
item.description: Musk’s Twitter Roils With Hate Speech As Trolls Test New Limits Hateful and racist rhetoric swelled on the network as some politicians rejoiced.

item.title: Charting The Global Economy: ECB Boosts Rates; Fed, BOE On Deck
item.description: Charting The Global Economy: ECB Boosts Rates; Fed, BOE On Deck Here are some of the charts that appeared this week on the latest developments in the global economy.

item.title: Amazon Slips Below $1 Trillion in Value After Bleak Outlook
item.description: Amazon Slips Below $1 Trillion in Value After Bleak Outlook The e-commerce giant joins a long list of US companies seeing their market values crumble.

item.title: India will not forget 26/11 attack on Mumbai: Jaishankar at UNSC meet on terrorism
item.description: India will not forget 26/11 attack on Mumbai: Jaishankar at UNSC meet on terrorism India will not forget 26/11 attack on Mumbai: Jaishankar at UNSC meet on terrorism

item.title: Musk-Twitter Countdown to Close $44 Billion Deal Begins
item.description: Musk-Twitter Countdown to Close $44 Billion Deal Begins After months of “will they or won’t they,” Elon Musk is running up against a court-ordered deadline to deliver on his promise to buy Twitter Inc.

item.title: Morgan Stanley Downgrades Meta For First Time As Costs Soar
item.description: Morgan Stanley Downgrades Meta For First Time As Costs Soar Shares of the Facebook parent were down 20% in premarket trading after it gave a disappointing quarterly revenue outlook.

item.title: JSW Steel Expects Margins To Revive After Surprise Loss
item.description: JSW Steel Expects Margins To Revive After Surprise Loss India’s JSW Steel Ltd.

item.title: UK Bonds Fall After Government Delays Fiscal Plan To Next Month
item.description: UK Bonds Fall After Government Delays Fiscal Plan To Next Month UK bonds fell as the government delayed its fiscal plan due next week, prolonging uncertainty weighing on the nation’s fragile markets.

item.title: Europe’s Gas Glut to Help Ease Winter LNG Supply Crunch in Asia
item.description: Europe’s Gas Glut to Help Ease Winter LNG Supply Crunch in Asia Europe’s near-term natural gas supply glut means more fuel for Asia this winter.

item.title: Singapore Proposes Ban on Borrowing to Fund Cryptocurrency Purchases
item.description: Singapore Proposes Ban on Borrowing to Fund Cryptocurrency Purchases Singapore proposed to ban retail investors from borrowing to fund cryptocurrency purchases, moving to tighten regulatory regime.

item.title: Bolsonaro Stalls In Polls After Ally Clashes With Police
item.description: Bolsonaro Stalls In Polls After Ally Clashes With Police Leftist challenger Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, 76, would take 54% of valid votes, which exclude null and blank ballots.

item.title: Sunak’s ‘Dullness Dividend’ Might Not Last
item.description: Sunak’s ‘Dullness Dividend’ Might Not Last Britain’s new prime minister is an improvement over his predecessors — but keeping his promises won’t be easy.

item.title: Too Much Gas. Europe’s Energy Crisis Takes A Surprise Turn
item.description: Too Much Gas. Europe’s Energy Crisis Takes A Surprise Turn Europe suddenly has more gas than it can use.

item.title: Rishi Sunak Tells UK Tories To Unite As He Strives To Fix ‘Crisis’
item.description: Rishi Sunak Tells UK Tories To Unite As He Strives To Fix ‘Crisis’ Rishi Sunak called on his warring Conservative Party to unite as the UK’s incoming prime minister bids to fix the crisis facing the economy.

item.title: Texas Governor celebrates Diwali with Indian-Americans
item.description: Texas Governor celebrates Diwali with Indian-Americans The couple was dressed in ethnic Indian attire as they welcomed guests, and also lit the traditional lamp to mark the festival.

item.title: He went to the room and knocked and called but there was no response; Expatriate Malayali died in Saudi
item.description: He went to the room and knocked and called but there was no response; Expatriate Malayali died in Saudi Saudi: Ajit Sahadevan, a native of Kanyakumari Moovotukonam, who was working at Riyadh Exit 7 Alwadi, died.

item.title: Ice engineering laboratory to be created in the Jewish Autonomous Region
item.description: Ice engineering laboratory to be created in the Jewish Autonomous Region The JAO plans to develop effective ways to destroy the ice cover on rivers during freeze-up.

item.title: Tomorrow almost a quarter of the sun will be eclipsed: ‘Pretty good chance of good visibility’
item.description: Tomorrow almost a quarter of the sun will be eclipsed: ‘Pretty good chance of good visibility’ There is a good chance that we will be able to see part of the solar eclipse tomorrow in the Netherlands.

item.title: Sunak Edges Closer to UK Leadership Prize As Johnson Caves
item.description: Sunak Edges Closer to UK Leadership Prize As Johnson Caves Boris Johnson pulled out of the race to lead the UK’s ruling Conservative Party and the nation, ending a bid to replace Liz Truss as prime minister.

item.title: Did NATO Plan A Pre-Emptive Strike On Russia
item.description: Did NATO Plan A Pre-Emptive Strike On Russia Polaris 21 - The French Maritime Exercise that saw participation of 24 ships, one submarine, 65 aircraft and 6000 personnel with partners from Europe and USA The post Did NATO Plan A Pre-Emptive Strike On Russia appeared first on N4M (News4masses).
